awd_titl_txt: Research Initiation:  Development and Implementation of     Prototypes for an Experimental Infrastructure Management    System
awd_abstract_narration: The nation's physical plant is currently deteriorating more rapidly             than it is being maintained.  To assist in the planning and scheduling          of maintenance operations, it is essential to have the data of each             type of facility properly documented and organized.  This project will          investigate the methods most appropriate for each facility to gather            the data, store it, analyze it, display it, and disseminate it through          a geographic information system.  The results of the investigation will         be of benefit to managers of facilities by helping them to determine            budget requirements and future actions.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

inst.inst_name: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
